R + Co hair care products are now available at Luxe Concept Salon, Chatswood.  Don’t live in Sydney? No problem – we are happy to arrange postage to anywhere in Australia.  You can either purchase R+Co via our online shop – or call us to discuss the best product and arrange delivery.

R + Co is a collective of some of the most knowledgable, forward-thinking hairstylists in the business, and liken themselves to a “supergroup” that has come together to share the knowledge gained over a combined century of hairdressing. 

At R+Co, each product is about an experience. The packaging and fragrances are designed to enhance that experience and evoke a feeling, place, style or attitude. You’ll know just by looking at a bottle or tube what a product is meant to do, and the subtle yet sophisticated fragrances – meant for both men and women.

All products are treatment orientated, with the health of the hair and scalp always top-of-mind. We use unique ingredients and complexes to make sure that each product delivers true benefits. And everything is formulated without parabens, sulphates (SLS or SLES), mineral oil and petrolatum. They are all vegetarian, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and colour safe and many are also UV protective.

Contact Luxe to learn more about the R+Co hair care range and view the range now.
